thread.title: Ander Herrera goal, post man of the match interview (video)
thread.title_full: Ander Herrera goal, post man of the match interview (video)

author: paulmbanks
title: Ander Herrera goal, post man of the match interview (video)
text:
Tweet 
A week ahead of what will be an absolutely huge Manchester Derby, third place Manchester United made a resounding statement today. United beat Everton 3-0 and Midfielder Ander Herrera took home the man of the match award. Herrera really made a case for Manager Louis van Gaal to start him full time. 
Check out these statistics: Ander Herrera vs Everton93% pass accuracy3 take-ons2 chances created1 assist1 goalMOTM for me ? #MUFC 
— Fergie's Fledglings™ (@RedDevilTimes) October 17, 2015 
After the match, Van Gaal singled out Herrera as superlative: 
“If I have to mention one name, it would be Ander Herrera ,” the Dutchman said. 
“He played well and made a big contribution to our goals.” 
You may be wondering why Ander doesn’t play more often, given how effective he’s been. Van Gaal later said: “It’s difficult for me to drop him, but I can do it.” 
Which is a compliment; probably. Here is the post match interview of Herrera: 
And here’s footage of his goal:
